left.text: PROMETHEUS stands for PROject for Military Exposures and Toxin History Evaluation in US Service Members. The Prometheus Data Platform (PDP) is part of the President Biden Cancer Moonshot 2.0, which aims to mobilize a national effort to end cancer as we know it. The PDP is a robust data mesh designed to support existing and future Prometheus projects. PDP provides a hybrid governance structure, ensuring a secure and compliant data exchange through specialized software services, referred to as Gen3 Mesh Services.
